meanings.sent1: The syrup oozes out of the bottle.
meanings.sent2: Water oozes from the sponge when squeezed.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate oozes deliciously over the cake.
meanings.sent4: Time oozes away like sand through an hourglass.
meanings.sent5: The lava oozes down the volcano's slopes, creating a fiery spectacle.

meanings.definition: (noun) A slow, steady flow or leak
meanings.sent1: The oozes of honey attracted bees to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The oozes of oil from the engine indicated a leak.
meanings.sent3: The oozes of paint on the canvas blended into a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The oozes of information from the spy were carefully monitored.
meanings.sent5: The oozes of molasses in the jar made it difficult to pour.
